room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Great experience! We did "Hostage", Highly recommend to anyone who wants to exercise your mind and pretend being a super agent for an hour.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: This was the best time I have had in a long time. You can really get immersed in the story and the puzzles were tough but fun too. Awesome, I will be back to try the rest!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Super cool experience! There are different themes you can choose. We chose hostage and had a great time! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: Super cool experience! We chose the Hostage room and had a great time. Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Boston in Boston
review: The best escape room in the area! The props and technology are awesome. Staff are very funny and friendly. All 4 rooms are unique and well done.
